content:
I've added a reminder to your monthly list:

**Monthly Reminders:**

1. **Check your loyalty program balances:** Review your points and cashback balances for Walgreens Balance Rewards, Target RedCard, Ibotta, CVS ExtraCare, and Staples Rewards.
2. **Check the weekly ads and apps for Walgreens and CVS:** Stay up-to-date on the latest sales and promotions by checking the weekly ads and apps for both Walgreens and CVS.

You'll receive a reminder on the 1st of every month to review your balances and check the weekly ads and apps for Walgreens and CVS. This will help you stay on top of your loyalty programs and make sure you're taking advantage of all the deals and discounts available to you!

Let me know if you need any further assistance or if there's anything else I can do to help you maximize your loyalty program earnings!
